# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe the change and why it's needed.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor / chore

## How was this tested?

- [ ] `dotnet test ./Dtde.sln -c Release`

## Checklist

- [ ] I updated documentation (`/docs`) where needed
- [ ] I updated `CHANGELOG.md` for user-visible changes
- [ ] I added/updated tests where appropriate
- [ ] I verified build and tests pass locally

## Notes for reviewers

Anything you want reviewers to focus on.
